title: Control's Publisher Doubles Down on Next-Gen Upgrade - Kinda Funny Games Daily 08.20.20
description:
Blessing and Greg talk about a new blog post detailing the vision for the upgrade process of Control on Xbox Series X and PlayStation 5.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:04:30 - Housekeeping
Today! Greg, SnowBikeMike, Joey, and Kevin are streaming Fall Guys! twitch.tv/kindafunnygames at 2 pm PT!
Tomorrow -- Friday -- at 9:45 am PT on twitch.tv/kindafunnygames, Greg and Tim are going to give a mini-Town Hall updating you on the Patreon goals from January in our new COVID Timeline. Then, Games Daily at 10 a.m.!
DC FanDome is SATURDAY, and we’re treating it like Greg Miller’s personal E3. Greg and the Kinda Funny crew will be on twitch.tv/kindafunnygames all day long reacting to the panels for Suicide Squad: Kill the Justice League, WB Montreal’s game, the Snyder cut, and every other DC movie. It all starts at 10 am PT, so don’t miss it!
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Mohammed Mohammed & Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:09:15 - 505 Games explains the Control next-gen upgrade debacle In a blog post called: Control Ultimate Edition - An Explanation
00:13:15 -  - Best Friends Q:anakinjmt
00:26:10 - Rocksteady releases employee letter defending it from accusations - Brendan Sinclair @ Gamesindustry.biz
00:35:25 - Call of Duty Black Ops Cold War has finally been Confirmed - Matt Kim @ IGN
00:38:20 - EA Access is becoming EA Play - Alyssa Mercante @ GamesRadar
00:42:05 - Vampire: The Masquerade — Bloodlines 2 fires their Lead Writer and Director - Owen Good @ Polygon
00:44:33 -  Could Demon Souls be coming sooner than we think? - Liam Croft @ Pushsquare
00:48:50 - Take-Two acquires mobile developer Playdots - Sam Desatoff @ GameDaily.biz
00:52:00 -  DoorDash 
00:53:20 - Out today

Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg and Blessing
